caption:
This photograph features a striking contrast between natural elements and industrial setting. In the foreground, there is a sharply focused image of an old, textured tree trunk with rough, peeling bark. Perched prominently on top of this trunk is a small bird, appearing in silhouette against the brighter background. This sets a naturalistic, serene scene at the forefront.

In contrast, the background displays a blurrier view of an industrial environment consisting of several tall, cylindrical smokestacks, which rise above a cluster of buildings amidst a wooded hillside. The smokestacks are of varying heights and are steel gray in color. They dominate the background, symbolizing industrial activity and possibly pollution, suggested by their size and the smoke emitted from one of them.

The visual focus on the tree trunk and the bird in the foreground against the industrial backdrop generates a metaphoric juxtaposition, possibly commenting on the encroachment of industrialization into natural spaces or the resilience of nature in industrial settings. The cool color tones and the soft focus on the distant smokestacks create a dreamlike or contemplative atmosphere, emphasizing the environmental narrative.
title: Smokestacks of the DuPont Belle Works on the Kanawha River. Photograph was taken from Marmet on the other side of the Kanawha.
